text: Ani sarvacya sarva tumacya palanakartyasamora rangaranganni hajara kele jatila. Nihsansaya tumhi amacyasamora tyaca prakare ale, jya prakare amhi tumhala pahilya khepesa nirmana kele hote. Parantu tumhi matra asa bhramata rahile ki amhi kadhi tumacyasathi ekhada vayadyaca divasa niscita karanara nahi
